entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 in the afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
